name: open-web-inspector
description: The open source web element inspector - AI-controllable DOM inspection with live CSS editing, hover highlighting, and developer tools integration

scripts.test: echo "Navigate to http://localhost:8002/examples/ to test the functionality" && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:prod: mkdir -p dist && terser src/index.js -o dist/open-web-inspector.min.js --compress passes=3,drop_console=true,drop_debugger=true,pure_funcs=['console.log','console.debug','console.info'] --mangle --source-map --comments false
scripts.build:extension: npm run build && npm run build:extension:chrome
scripts.build:extension:chrome: cp dist/open-web-inspector.min.js extensions/chrome/lib/ && echo "âœ… Chrome extension built with latest minified code"
scripts.package:extension: npm run build:extension && cd extensions/chrome && zip -r ../../open-web-inspector-chrome-extension.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' '*/.DS_Store'
scripts.dev:extension: npm run build:extension && echo "ðŸ”§ Chrome extension ready for developer mode loading from extensions/chrome/"
scripts.release: npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "ðŸš€ Release $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push
scripts.automation:setup: echo "ðŸ“‹ Chrome Web Store automation setup instructions in CHROME_WEB_STORE_AUTOMATION.md"
scripts.size: npm run build && echo "ðŸ“¦ Build sizes:" && ls -lah dist/*.js | awk '{print $5, $9}'

author: Your Name
